entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow and ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
